select isp.*,mm.name as materialName,mm.unit from iqc_sample_plan isp left join md_material mm on mm.code = isp.material_nb where isp.delete_flag = 0 and isp.sscc_nb like concat('%', #{ssccNb}, '%')
and isp.ware_code like concat('%', #{wareCode}, '%')
and isp.cell like concat('%', #{cell}, '%')
and isp.material_nb like concat('%', #{materialNb}, '%')
and isp.status = #{status}
and isp.status in
#{status}
and isp.bin_down_user like concat('%', #{binDownUser}, '%')
and isp.sample_user like concat('%', #{sampleUser}, '%')
and isp.bin_down_time >= #{startBinDownTime} and isp.bin_down_time <= #{endBinDownTime} and isp.sample_time >= #{startSampleTime} and isp.sample_time <= #{endSampleTime} order by isp.create_time desc,isp.update_time desc

select isp.*, bi.recommend_bin_code as recommend_bin_code from iqc_sample_plan isp left join bi_in bi on bi.sscc_number = isp.sscc_nb and bi.delete_flag = 0 where isp.delete_flag = 0 and isp.sscc_nb = #{sscc}
